detail_desc: Slippers in soft fabric with faux fur linings and insoles, and soles with anti-slip protectors.
Long-sleeved tops in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels, a gently tapered waist, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No buttons. Lined.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Body in ribbed jersey with a round neck at the front and low-cut back. Shoulder straps with plastic rings, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Fine-knit cardigan in a merino wool blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, concealed zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck blouse in a softly draping weave with 3/4-length flounced sleeves and a gently rounded hem.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short shirt dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Jumper in a soft knit with a wide neckline, low-dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lightly brushed surface.
Sturdy shaping shorts with longer legs that have a push-up effect on the seat while shaping the stomach and thighs. Seamless.
Baby Exclusive. Tube scarf knitted in a soft cotton and silk blend.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Lace cardigan with 3/4-length dolman sleeves, a rounded hem and no buttons.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Double-layered scarf in a soft jacquard knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 20x140 cm.

prod_name: SB Nicholas water resi Ski Jkt
detail_desc: Padded ski jacket in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, a chest pocket, a sleeve pocket and zipped side pockets. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs and a snow flap with press-studs at the waist. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded all-in-one suit in a lightly brushed, patterned weave. Faux shearling-lined hood, two concealed zips down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the back of the waist. Foldover mitts at the cuffs and foldover feet at the hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Fleece lining. The polyester content of the suit is recycled.
Twill waistcoat with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and front pockets. Lined.
Long, wide dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a frilled collar with an opening and ties at the front, long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. No buttons.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend containing glittery threads.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Shorter top in a fine knit with a V-neck, shoulder straps and a straight hem.
Linen scarf with raw edges and short fringe trims on the short sides.
Wide, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a sewn-in tie belt and pleats at the top. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Top in soft, printed jersey with short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in an airy weave with a regular, elasticated waist, welt side pockets and fake back pockets. Loose fit with a fake fly and tapered legs with creases.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Jersey jacket in a cotton blend with notch lapels, front pockets and no buttons. Unlined.
Long-sleeved turtleneck top with a concealed zip at the back of the neck.

Running gloves with uppers in windproof, functional fabric. Wide ribbing at the top with a reflective print. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material. Unlined.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip and detachable hood in a double layer of sturdy jersey. Collar with metal buttons, shoulder tabs with fake metal buttons and a yoke at the back. Zipped front pockets. Lined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length dress in a soft, patterned jacquard weave with fringe trims and contrasting colour seams. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top, both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Patterned swimsuit with decorative bows on the shoulders and a lined gusset.
Short top in a crinkled viscose weave with lace details. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a wrapover front and an elasticated hem.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Ballet pumps with a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.

Padded ski mittens in star-print windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced palms for a firmer grip. Imitation suede section at the thumbs, and ribbing and an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the top. Thinsulate™ lining.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, cable-knit section at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a turtleneck and short sleeves.

Knitted jacket with a soft fleece lining, hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, front pockets and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Trims in contrasting colour jersey around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a wrapover front with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and panels with a text print down the sides of the legs.
Braided headband in a soft knit.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short top in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front and ties at the hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pile jacket with a collar that can be made into a high stand-up collar with a button, buttons down the front and open, diagonal side pockets. Imitation leather details and lining.
Short, straight-cut coat in a textured weave with concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long, wide sleeves and a single back vent. Lined.
Cropped sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Waist bag in scuba fabric with one large zipped compartment and a small pocket with a press-stud on the outside at the front. Adjustable waist strap with a large plastic snap lock. Lined. Size approx. 12x32 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Short, sleeveless shirt dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with frill-trimmed sleeves.

Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and a buttonhole. Side pockets, two inner pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jersey top with long sleeves and a tie at the hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Brogues in imitation leather with a decorative welt seam around the soles, a hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and patterned soles. Height of soles 1.7 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned weave with flounces, a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and ties at one side.
Boxy-style jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sandals with covered block heels and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a polo neck, long sleeves and double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative tie detail at the hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
